TopicTitle: new dutch design ((micro stealth vtol)) ksp versie 21

Articles.Content:
hey guy this is an improved version of the micro vtol.

it has a nice balance, and can easily fly without asas, but with the new ksp version, of course, also with.

I use it to explore the new base.

ps c7 i love the new asas. it fly's like a dream.

toggle's:

1 horizontal engine

2 vertical engine

the planefile:

http://www./?hoaonh4txes1o5l

Wow, that's awesome. Looks like it must control really well. I'll have to give it a try.

Also, just a question because I'm curious. Are you Dutch? I notice you always put "new dutch design" in your thread titles here.

Wow, that's awesome. Looks like it must control really well. I'll have to give it a try.

Also, just a question because I'm curious. Are you Dutch? I notice you always put "new dutch design" in your thread titles here.

for such a small aircraft it is very stable.

and yes i am dutch, i see new dutch design as sort of a spaceplane company name
Nice craft I am just wondering why is it a stealth vtol? Or am I missing something?

Nice craft I am just wondering why is it a stealth vtol? Or am I missing something?

i thought it lookt like a stealthe plane. thats all

Love love love this !! flys awesome!

glad you like it.
saying that im having trouble V-TOL landing on a mountain peak,lol, it keeps exploding, guess its the altitude

saying that im having trouble V-TOL landing on a mountain peak,lol, it keeps exploding, guess its the altitude

exploding??? how do you mean? you see i have found out that the front ladinggear clashes when clossing against the copit.

move the gear forward a little. or atleast dont open it to close to the ground

exploding??? how do you mean? you see i have found out that the front ladinggear clashes when clossing against the copit.

move the gear forward a little. or atleast dont open it to close to the ground

Well I fly to the mountain, switch to the hover engine and as I lower to the mountain peak around 6.5km it just explodes, 2 times in a row, quite odd.
Hey, as soon as I load it on the runway the pod drops to the ground, and the whole plane is very floppy without strutting. HALP?

Well I fly to the mountain, switch to the hover engine and as I lower to the mountain peak around 6.5km it just explodes, 2 times in a row, quite odd.

and the engine did not overheat? the basisengine can blowup like that.

but perhaps its a bug.

Hey, as soon as I load it on the runway the pod drops to the ground, and the whole plane is very floppy without strutting. HALP?

have you tried moving the plane in the hanger.

some how that always help when i have troubel whit a downloaded plane.
